cards.heading: Oh, hey there!
subheading: My name is Gaia Di Gregorio and I am a front-end developer.
I love creating bold and user-friendly websites: solid, scalable and that will stick with you
Keep going and see what this is all about!

cards.heading: What can I do
subheading:
I'm good with languages.
Personally and professionally.
And with libraries and frameworks too.
I have a solid experience with React, Next.js, TypeScript and SCSS.

cards.heading: Who did I work with
subheading: I was lucky to collaborate with amazing clients from different industries.
Worth to mention some of them: iFit, CapitalOne, Degreed, Trex and others.

cards.heading: What else can I say?
subheading: Been exposed to diversity all my life, I give my best outside safe spaces
When I'm not online, I'm learning jiu jitsu, visiting new places, or ironically-ish singing karaoke.

cards.heading: Get in touch
subheading: You can find me on LinkedIn
